title: Toy Datasets For TILT
text: goal tiltToyData provide toy datasets TILT.

title: Toy Datasets For TILT
text: can install development version tiltToyData like :

title: tiltToyData: Toy Datasets For 'TILT' — tiltToyData-package

what: Get path to toy datasets — toy_files
title: Get path to toy datasets — toy_files
text: package comes bundled number toy datasets 'inst/extdata' directory. Use toy_files() list available datasets toy_path() retrieve path one example.

title: Get path to toy datasets — toy_files
Get path to toy datasets — toy_files
text: pattern regular expression filenames match. NULL available files returned. listed. file File.

title: Get path to toy datasets — toy_files
